data.name: Death Skid Marks Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Death Skid Marks Original Sound Track!

51 tracks of punk/metal music. Fits perfectly with any mullet.

01 Another dick in the wall
02 Select your poison
03 Hymn to 2 assholes
04 Hymn to the champion
05 Death Toll: Rest in pieces
06 Thrash your mullet like you mean it
07 The diaper filler
08 Meet the douche
09 Dance with the douche
10 Get to know the douche
11 Fucking the douche
12 Not again!
13 I'm Mark Skid
14 Mysterious Mengele
15 Sir Prize!
16 Oversaturation, retard and filled diaper
17 Skid Marked
18 Groupie love
19 Polaroid (we still use this)
20 A taste of chainsaw
21 Unstoppable mullet
22 Wasted crusaders
23 Hangover cult
24 Road of dismemberment
25 Pissed with a saw
26 Buckle up
27 Bloody wipers
28 Guard rail grinder
29 The tale of sausage bob
30 Flame thrower headbang
31 Forgotten drinks
32 Rubbing my rocket launcher
33 The brick eater
34 Preparing self detonation
35 Human speedbump
36 Gibblet foursome
37 Skidmarks: Ghosts of grease
38 High caliber recoil
39 Lernie: The hated one
40 Blind horse race
41 Who the fuck probed me?!
42 Lead brain
43 Mullety prophet
44 Freedoom gunshop
45 Changing wants into haves
46 Buying drugs
47 High roller Skid
48 Wanker!
49 Guess what?
50 OH YEAH! (Hard again)
51 When you gonna drill me?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 91 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: It's just a soundtrack!
